data.name: NASCAR Heat 3 - December Pack
data.detailed_description:
The NASCAR Heat 3 December DLC includes 47 new paint schemes from the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, including 11 race win schemes from the second half of the 2018 season. It also includes 10 schemes from the NASCAR XFINITY Series, 9 from the NASCAR Camping World Truck Series, and 3 new Challenges!

Expect paint schemes like the following:

MENCS:
Martin Truex Jr., Sonoma "Race Win" Scheme
Brad Keselowski, Las Vegas "Race Win" Scheme
Ryan Blaney, The Roval "Race Win" Scheme

NXS:
Ty Dillon, Nexium Clear Minis Scheme
Brandon Jones, Juniper Networks Scheme

NCWTS:
Todd Gilliland, Pedigree Puppy Scheme
Harrison Burton, Hunt Brother’s Pizza Scheme
Plus many more!

data.short_description: The NASCAR Heat 3 December DLC includes 47 paint schemes from the Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series, including 11 race win schemes from the second half of the season. It also includes 10 schemes from the XFINITY Series, 9 from the Camping World Truck Series, and 3 new Challenges!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, 8 and 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530 or AMD FX 4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or AMD HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcards
  • Additional Notes: Supported Graphics Cards: AMD HD5870 or better, HD6870 or better, HD7790 or better, R7 260 or better, R9 260 or better, Nvidia GTX460 or better, GTX560 or better, GTX650Ti or better, GTX750 or better, GTX950 or better

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
